file.name: objectstore-manager-oas.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: Os4ml Objectstore Manager Api
  description: Os4ml Objectstore Manager
  version: 0.0.1
servers:
  - url: 'http://os4ml-objectstore-manager.os4ml.svc.cluster.local:8000'
paths:
  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore":
    get:
      summary: "get all buckets"
      operationId: getAllBuckets
      tags:
        - objectstore
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Successful response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Bucket'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/databag":
    get:
      summary: "get all databags"
      operationId: getAllDatabags
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - databag
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Successful response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/Databag'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/databag/{bucket_name}":
    get:
      summary: "get databag by bucket name"
      operationId: getDatabagByBucketName
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - databag
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
      responses:
        200:
          description: "Successful response"
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/Databag'
    put:
      summary: "update databag"
      operationId: putDatabagByBucketName
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - databag
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/Databag'
      responses:
        201:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Created'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/{bucket_name}":
    post:
      summary: "create new bucket"
      operationId: postNewBucket
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - bucket
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
      responses:
        201:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Created'
        400:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/RequestBodyInvalid'
    delete:
      summary: "delete bucket"
      operationId: deleteBucket
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - bucket
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
      responses:
        204:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Deleted'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/{bucket_name}/object":
    get:
      summary: "get all Objects in bucket"
      operationId: getAllObjects
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - bucket
        - object
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: '#/components/schemas/Item'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/{bucket_name}/object/{object_name}":
    get:
      summary: 'get specific Object from Bucket'
      operationId: getObjectByName
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - bucket
        - object
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ObjectName'
      responses:
        307:
          description: Redirect
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
    delete:
      summary: 'delete specific Object from Bucket'
      operationId: deleteObjectByName
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - bucket
        - object
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ObjectName'
      responses:
        204:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Deleted'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
    put:
      summary: 'put Object to Bucket'
      operationId: putObjectByName
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - object
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ObjectName'
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/octet-stream:
            schema:
              type: string
              format: binary
      responses:
        201:
          description: Created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Item'
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/{bucket_name}/presignedgeturl/{object_name}":
    get:
      summary: "get Object Url"
      operationId: getObjectUrl
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - bucket
        - object
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ObjectName'
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Url'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/{bucket_name}/presignedputurl/{object_name}":
    get:
      summary: 'get presigned put Url'
      operationId: getPresignedPutUrl
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - bucket
        - object
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/BucketName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ObjectName'
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: string
        404:
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/template/component":
    get:
      summary: 'get all component templates'
      operationId: getAllComponentTemplates
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - template
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/PipelineTemplate'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/template/pipeline":
    get:
      summary: 'get all pipeline templates'
      operationId: getAllPipelineTemplates
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - template
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/PipelineTemplate'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/template/component/{component_name}":
    get:
      summary: 'get component template by name'
      operationId: getComponentTemplateByName
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/ComponentName'
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - template
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/PipelineTemplate'

  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/template/pipeline/{pipeline_name}":
    get:
      summary: 'get component template by name'
      operationId: getPipelineTemplateByName
      parameters:
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/PipelineName'
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - template
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/PipelineTemplate'
  "/apis/v1beta1/objectstore/solution":
    get:
      summary: 'get all solutions'
      operationId: getAllSolutions
      tags:
        - objectstore
        - solution
      responses:
        200:
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/Solution'

components:
  schemas:
    Url:
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
    ObjectName:
      type: string
    ComponentName:
      type: string
    PipelineName:
      type: string
    Bucket:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/BucketName'
      required:
        - name
    Item:
      properties:
        bucketName:
          $ref: "./shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/BucketName"
        objectName:
          $ref: "#/components/schemas/ObjectName"
      required:
        - bucketName
        - objectName
    Error:
      required:
        - path
        - error
        - timestamp
        - message
        - status

  parameters:
    BucketName:
      name: BucketName
      in: path
      description: Name of Bucket
      required: true
      schema:
        $ref: './shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/BucketName'
    ObjectName:
      name: ObjectName
      in: path
      description: Name of Object
      required: true
      schema:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/ObjectName'
    ComponentName:
      name: ComponentName
      in: path
      description: Name of Component Template
      required: true
      schema:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/ComponentName'
    PipelineName:
      name: PipelineName
      in: path
      description: Name of Pipeline Template
      required: true
      schema:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/PipelineName'

  responses:
    Created:
      description: New resource created
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "./shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/BucketName"
    Deleted:
      description: The specified resource was deleted
    Updated:
      description: The specified resource was updated
    NotFound:
      description: The specified resource was not found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    RequestBodyMismatch:
      description: The provided request body has the wrong format
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"
    RequestBodyInvalid:
      description: The content of the request body is invalid
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: "#/components/schemas/Error"

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: parameters: "BucketName": schema: parse schema: resolve "./shared-oas.yaml#/components/schemas/BucketName": external "./shared-oas.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
